suiteBundlesDetails.heading: Advanced Bill Management
suiteBundlesDetails.details: Speed up your vendor invoice processing times with SquareWorks’ OCR Technology to automatically capture invoice details into NetSuite.

suiteBundlesDetails.heading: Approval Workflow Automation
suiteBundlesDetails.details: Easily configure all your approval requirements and let your Employees – regardless of their NetSuite access – approve transactions right from their Email Inbox.

suiteBundlesDetails.heading: Advanced Attachments
suiteBundlesDetails.details: Drag and drop any files into NetSuite: Vendor Invoices, Contracts, Expense Receipts or any other files you need. Simplify how your files are managed in NetSuite.

suiteBundlesDetails.heading: Check Printing
suiteBundlesDetails.details: Say goodbye to your pre-printed check stock, lower your check printing costs and enhance your controls by enabling a better way to print checks in NetSuite.

suiteBundlesDetails.heading: 3 - Way Match
suiteBundlesDetails.details: As NetSuite users receive goods or process invoices from vendors, validations will be run in real-time to identify any variance violations with a 3-Way Match verification.

suiteBundlesDetails.heading: Vendor Request
suiteBundlesDetails.details: Enable all your NetSuite Users – including those with Employee Center Access – to request new Vendors by using a simple, yet fully configurable Vendor Request form.
